Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Interface ClientConnection

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientSocketConnection
public interface ClientConnection

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void closeConnection()
    Closes the connection.
    void registerObserver​(Observer<java.lang.String> observer)
    Adds a new observer.
    void send​(java.lang.Object message)
    Sends the specified message to the client.
    void setActive​(boolean updated)
    Activates or deactivates the ClientConnection.
    void setStillConnected​(boolean isStillConnected)
    Set stillConnected in ClientConnection if the client has responded with a pong.

  • Method Details

    • closeConnection

      void closeConnection()
      Closes the connection.

    • registerObserver

      void registerObserver​(Observer<java.lang.String> observer)
      Adds a new observer.
      Parameters:
      observer - the new observer

    • send

      void send​(java.lang.Object message)
      Sends the specified message to the client.
      Parameters:
      message - the message for the client

    • setActive

      void setActive​(boolean updated)
      Activates or deactivates the ClientConnection.
      Parameters:
      updated - boolean specifying whether the connection should be set to active (true) or inactive (false).

    • setStillConnected

      void setStillConnected​(boolean isStillConnected)
      Set stillConnected in ClientConnection if the client has responded with a pong.

      This method should be thread-safe on the stillConnected object.
